DistanceMode: How the offset distance is set.
DirectionMode: Which way to move vertices during the offset
MaxDistanceScaleFactor: Controls the maximum distance vertices can move from the target distance in order to stay parallel with their source triangles.
bShellsToSolids: Controls whether offsetting an entire open-border patch should create a solid or an open shell
MeasureDirection: What axis to measure the offset distance along.
bUseColinearityForSettingBorderGroups:
When offsetting regions that touch the mesh border, assign the side groups (groups on the
stitched side of the offset) in a way that considers edge colinearity. For instance, when
true, extruding a flat rectangle will give four different groups on its sides rather than
one connected group.
